These will serve as amendments for agreements (to add additional assets owned by an assignor, or to add/remove signatories).

voting group: @commonhaus/cf-egc 

Do one of the following:

- Approve the PR or react with ğŸ‘ (:+1:) if it looks good to you
- Review with Comments or react with ğŸ‘€ (:eyes:) if you're "ok" with it (it may not be your favorite)
- If you think it needs discussion or revision
    - Create a review, add your comments and require changes
    - Use the +- button to make a suggestion (instead of just adding a comment).
